pr_title: NXP-28744: upgrade Apache POI and adapt JXLS 1

timeline.message: NXP-28744: upgrade JXLS to 1.0.6-NX02 for Apache POI 4.1.2 compatibility

timeline.bodyText: Seems never set, how can this work 🤔
timeline.author: ataillefer

replies.bodyText: It's set in the subclass — I didn't want to change the whole API of SimpleConverterTest
replies.author: efge

replies.bodyText:
OK, still sounds weird but fine.
Anyway, there is only one subclass of AdvancedMSOfficeConverterTest...
replies.author: ataillefer
